Create a personalized sound library for each user based on their listening preferences, using advanced audio processing algorithms and machine learning techniques.
Develop an app that uses augmented reality technology to enhance the listening experience by overlaying visual effects on top of the music.
Create a platform that connects musicians with fans in real-time, allowing them to interact and collaborate during live performances.
Develop a system that uses biometric data to analyze a listener's emotional response to music, providing personalized recommendations based on their mood.
Create a smart speaker that integrates with popular streaming services, allowing users to control their music playback using voice commands and natural language processing.
